titleInfo.title: Billy Block's Western Beat Songwriters Showcase (July 3)

mods.abstract: One color window card (red on white) announcing Billy Block's Western Beat Songwriters Showcase with Jo Nita, Rick Shea and Patty Booker, Kip Boardman, Kathrin Show, Tim Burlingame, Tom Corbett Band, Jake La Botz, Mike Stinson, Bryson Jones, Gregg Sarfaty and Bliss at the Highland Grounds on July 3.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
